meanings.definition: The quality or state of requiring great effort or energy.
meanings.sent1: Her strenuousness in completing the marathon impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber's face showed the signs of strenuousness.
meanings.sent3: The little dog tried to mimic the strenuousness of the big dogs in the park.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting captured the strenuousness of life's challenges.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice conveyed the strenuousness of the upcoming exam.

meanings.definition: The act of exerting oneself vigorously or strenuously.
meanings.sent1: The dancer's strenuousness on stage was evident in every move.
meanings.sent2: He felt the soreness in his muscles after the strenuousness of the workout.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned due to the strenuousness of the task assigned to it.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner's face reflected the strenuousness of the race.
meanings.sent5: The construction worker's sweat showed the strenuousness of his labor.
